Class HomeControllerRest

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.adminportal.HomeControllerRest

public class HomeControllerRest
extends java.lang.Object

        @PostMapping("/updateEvent")
@ResponseBody
public java.util.List<java.lang.String> updateEvent​(@RequestParam("poster")

                                                    java.lang.String regStarttemp,
                                                    @RequestParam("regEndDate")
                                                    java.lang.String regEndtemp)
                                             throws java.lang.Exception

        eventDesc - Description

        starttemp - Start date
        endtemp - End date
        regStarttemp - registration start date
        regEndtemp - registration end date
